captions.text: We are at the Etihad Stadium...
I'm the daddy for clearing the ball, eh?
You have to admit, at least I know how to clear the ball.
The free kick... obviously that Kun shot... it was a good free kick.
Whack it in the back of the net, boss!
Greedy, you hogged the ball. Tell me what we're doing here?
Are you crazy? That would make us traitors!
We have to score a goal!
I tried to strike to the same angle I did against Bayern but it hit the post.
Here Yahus... Go for it Yahus! Yahus!
He tackled the ball instead of shooting...
One time, Boyata... twice... I give him the ball, he couldn't score.
Sergio and I have won the tournament.

title: FIFA 15 - Manchester City Player Tournament - Agüero, Nasri, Touré, Boyata
